domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text: @TMobile @Tesla I would go out to Houston to pickup my daughter and her family, and bring her home to Orlando. Covid-19 is hitting Florida, just as hard as Texas, but at least we will be together. This Mom in this moment in history just wants her babies close to home.#TMobileTuesdays  #contest
